meanings.meaning: 1. counter for occurrences 新種の稲によっては年に２、３回収穫できる物もある。Some new kinds of rice can be harvested two or three times a year.
2. a time; an instance このトーナメントに優勝するには、７回続けて勝たなくてはいけません。We have to win seven times in a row to win this tournament.
3. inning (baseball); round; game

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 4. episode; chapter; instalment Colloquial
5. Hui (people) Abbreviation, See also 回族
6. Islam Abbreviation, See also 回教

meanings.meaning: 1. circumference; girth See also 回り まわり
2. surroundings; neighbourhood; neighborhood; vicinity 周りを見渡しなさい。Look about you.
3. people surrounding oneself; surrounding circumstances 彼は多くの点で周りの人と違う。He is different from the people around him.

sentences.translation: Look about you.
He is different from the people around him.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to turn; to rotate; to revolve; to spin 踊り手はつま先立ってぐるぐると回った。The dancer spun on his toes.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to go around; to circle; to revolve around; to orbit その船は岬を回った。The ship sailed around the cape.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to make the rounds (of); to go around (several places); to travel around; to make a tour of; to patrol 子供達はハロウィーンの夜に１軒ずつ家を訪ねてまわる。Children walk around from door to door on Halloween night.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to go by way of; to go via; to stop by (on the way); to take a roundabout route; to make a detour

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to move around (to another place or position); to come around; to go over (e.g. to the opposing side) 私たちは車の後ろに回って押した。We got behind the car and pushed.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to come around (of one's turn); to be passed around (of a cup, circular, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to function; to work well あの人がいないと我が社は回っていかない。Without him our company would cease to function.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to spread; to extend (to; e.g. of one's attention); to reach; to take effect (of alcohol, poison, etc.) フライパンに油が回ってから肉を入れなさい。Put the meat in the frying pan after the oil has spread.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to pass (a time); to turn (e.g. 5 o'clock) お昼を少し回った時に彼が来た。He came a little after noon.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to earn interest
11. to ... around; to ... about See also 走り回る, after -masu stem of verb学生は一晩中騒ぎ回った。Students bustled about all the night.
廻る 【まわる】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to turn; to rotate; to spin; to twist; to gyrate いや、それじゃだめだ。逆になるようにまわしてごらん。No, that's not the right way. You have to turn it the other way round.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to pass around; to send around; to hand around; to circulate よろしければ塩をこちらに回して下さいませんか。The salt, if you please.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to move (someone or something to where its needed); to send; to bring; to transfer; to forward; to direct; to submit 社長に電話を回します。I'll put you through to the president.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to turn (to a new use); to use (for something else)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to turn on (something that turns or has a rotating part, e.g. a washing machine); to start up (e.g. an engine); to give (something) a spin トムさん，モーターを回してください。Please start up the motor, Tom.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to put (someone in a position); to make (e.g. an enemy of)

meanings.type: Auxiliary verb, Godan verb with 'su' ending
meanings.meaning: 7. to ... around (e.g. chase, fool, play); to do all over; to do everywhere; to do completely after the -masu stem of a verb

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to surround (something) with; to enclose with

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to put (an arm) around (e.g. someone's waist); to reach around 彼は彼女の腰に腕をまわした。He put his arm around her waist.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to invest (money); to lend

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to dial (a telephone number) 彼は受話器を取り上げてダイアルを回した。He took up the receiver and dialed.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to gang-rape See also 輪姦す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to operate (e.g. business, shop)
廻す 【まわす】
